author: Robert Marley
quote: One love, one heart, one destiny.

author: George Gordon Byron
quote: And thus the heart will break, yet brokenly live on.

author: William Wordsworth
quote: Fill your paper with the breathings of your heart.

author: Confucius
quote: Wheresoever you go, go with all your heart.

author: Blaise Pascal
quote: The heart has its reasons which reason knows not.

author: Ben Okri
quote: Stories can conquer fear, you know. They can make the heart bigger.

author: Aristotle
quote: Educating the mind without educating the heart is no education at all.

author: Albert Camus
quote: Blessed are the hearts that can bend; they shall never be broken.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.

author: Carlo Levi
quote: The future has an ancient heart.

author: Albert Camus
quote: At the heart of all beauty lies something inhuman.

author: Thomas Campbell
quote: To live in hearts we leave behind is not to die.

author: Margaret Landon
quote: She sat still, trying to hush her secret heart.

author: Edith Wharton
quote: My little old doga heart-beatat my feet

author: Mary Oliver
quote: Keep some room in your heart for the unimaginable.

author: Noah Webster
quote: The heart should be cultivated with more assiduity than the head.

author: Sophocles
quote: Fortune is not on the side of the faint-hearted.

author: Gary Snyder
quote: O, ah! The awareness of emptiness brings forth a heart of compassion!

author: Chuck Palahniuk
quote: Your heart is my piñata.

author: Rumi
quote: You have to keep breaking your heart until it opens.

author: Henry Rollins
quote: Life will not break your heart. It'll crush it.

author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez
quote: my heart has more rooms in it than a whore house

author: Christina Westover
quote: Unrequited love is the infinite curse of a lonely heart.

author: Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
quote: Only from the heart can you touch the sky.

author: Roy T. Bennett
quote: Nothing makes a person happier than having a happy heart.

author: Wystan Hugh Auden
quote: You shall love your crooked neighbour, with your crooked heart.

author: Joshua Wisenbaker
quote: Tears are words the mouth can't say nor can the heart bear.

author: Tennyson
quote: Sometimes the heart sees what's invisible to the eye.

author: Gerard Way
quote: Tears are words the heart can't express

author: Charles Dickens
quote: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: Spiteful words can hurt your feelings but silence breaks your heart.

author: che guevara
quote: Every day People straighten up the hair, why not the heart?

author: Alysha Speer
quote: Love is hard to find, hard to keep, and hard to forget.

author: Jane Austen
quote: There is no charm equal to tenderness of heart.

author: Christopher Marlowe
quote: Pluck up your hearts, since fate still rests our friend.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: Hearts Live By Being Wounded

author: Bob Dylan
quote: May your heart always be joyful. May your song always be sung.

author: John Lennon
quote: Remember to let her into your heart.

author: Lord George Gordon Byron
quote: The heart will break, but broken live on.

author: Bob Dylan
quote: I gave her my heart but she wanted my soul...

author: Victor Hugo
quote: Winter is on my head, but eternal spring is in my heart.

author: Abigail Adams
quote: My bursting heart must find vent at my pen.

author: Aaron Ben-Ze'ev
quote: Sometimes loneliness makes the loudest noise.

author: Mary Oliver
quote: It is better for the heart to break, than not to break.

author: Hafiz
quote: Your heart and my heartare very, very old friends.

author: William Wordsworth
quote: Nature never did betrayThe heart that loved her.

author: Truman Capote
quote: You can’t give your heart to a wild thing.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: How else but through a broken heart may Lord Christ enter in?

author: E.E. Cummings
quote: his lips drink water but his heart drinks wine

author: e.e. cummings
quote: Only by you my heart always moves.

author: Carrie Fisher
quote: Take your broken heart, make it into art.

author: Yasmin Mogahed
quote: Some hearts understand each other, even in silence.

author: Warsan Shire
quote: If it’ll keep my heart soft, break my heart every day.

author: Hafiz
quote: An awake heart is like a sky that pours light.

author: John Keats
quote: I have so much of you in my heart.

author: Bob Marley
quote: one love, one heart

author: Charles Spurgeon
quote: If you can't see His way past the tears, trust His heart.

author: Rumi
quote: The only lasting beauty is the beauty of the heart
